Killing Floor c'est avant tous un bon jeux de FPS coop, simple et efficace. Le jeux est très facile d'accès pour ceux qui si connaisse déja en FPS (mais pas du tous pour ceux qui vienne a peine de toucher un clavier). L'esprit old-school de la chose lui donne un certain charme que les vieux joueur aimeront sans aucun doute. Car il est vrai que tu viens pas jouer a ce jeux pour la grosse baffe graphique (on est très très loin des productions actuelle) mais malgré son faible aspect graphique le jeux semble intemporelle (c'est assez rare dans l'histoire du jeux vidéo ces dernier temps pour le souligner). Bref que dire sinon que si vous décider de tenter l'aventure (avec des amis de préférence) plein de fun, de stress, d'adrénaline, de fou-rire, de sursaut et de peur vous attende.

4/5
(parce que c'est pas non plus parfait hein)

This is my first review in seven plus years.  I love this game.  I normally get bored with games that are horde waves but this game keeps my intrest.  I do not buy DLC and still seem to be enjoying myself in my quest to get to all level 6s.  The community is great when you get in a room with people who work together you make real friends who will play with you again and again.  I have a older computer and this runs well on it,  I have to say I am hooked.  I can not recomment this game enough.  Keep in mind its the same thing over and over but on the quest for 6s this game is hitting all pros in my book.

Шесть лет назад Killing Floor ловко обманула игровую прессу: журналисты приняли ее за очередной дешевый зомби-шутер, облепили «крепкими середнячками» и пошли дальше — а она неожиданно оказалась народным хитом. Посмотрите на отзывы в Steam — многие наиграли в Killing Floor сотни и даже тысячи часов. «Совсем не затягивает».Мне игра очень нравиться :)

Sit in one place and hold left mouse button. That's pretty much the extent of most games. It blows my mind how people can possibly find this enjoyable. Kiting games are more interesting but they are extremely rare.

Jogo FPS, com ótima jogabilidade.
Muito divertido (apesar da idade) para jogar com os amigos.

Para quem gosta de jogos do gênero, é excelente, tem gráficos bons (Não espere algo como Crysis), você pode escolher seu PERK de acordo com a classe que gosta mais, elas variam desde pistolas até lança granadas, cada classe tem seu ponto forte, o que permite você criar estratégias diferentes, cada classe também tem descontos em armas e munições da mesma, onde é vantajoso acumular dinheiro em uma classe que contém armas e munições mais baratas para quando necessário utilizar uma classe mais cara.

[b]Pontos positivos:[/b][list]
[*]Suporta CO-OP de até 6 jogadores (Mapas normais) em MODs já vi com 24 jogadores
[*]Boa variedade de mapas
[*]Suporta LAN games, o que é muito raro hoje em dia
[*]Boa coleção de itens na Oficina (WORKSHOP)
[*]Boa variedade de armas
[/list]

[b]Pontos negativos:[/b][list]
 [*]Pouca variedade de personagens gratuitos para escolher (Default)
[*]Dificuldade não linear, o Beginner é muito fácil, o normal é bem difícil, os outros são quase que impossíveis
[*]Não temos bons SERVERS no Brasil, mais ainda é possível jogar com os amigos via partida privativa
[*]Jogo previsível em determinadas telas
[*]Após muitas horas de jogo ele pode se tornar repetitivo, se não utilizar a Oficina
[/list]

Recomendo jogar com amigos, pois é bem mais divertido.

キまり過ぎたキャンプ、FPSCの首を奪い合うシャープ様、チームに一台は居る芝刈り機のようなバーサーカー・・・。
そしてそれらが生み出す余裕は端っこでナイフをキンキンしあうホモやBBQを始める変質者、何故か居るnoobとその専属介護師を生み出していった。
そんな中、私は何故か大量に転がるクロスボウの在庫管理をしていた。
しかしある日突然その職を失うことになる。そう、ドロップしたアイテムが消えてしまうようになってしまったのだ。
私から唯一の職を奪った世界を許せ無かった反面、無気力にAFKするしか出来ない私にもとりあえず生きていれば不必要なまでに受給されるKFP (killing floor pounds : ケツを拭く紙にもならない。投げて遊べる。) に今までと変わらないやさしさを感じた。
そんな変わらぬやさしさに包まれながら私はいつしかオーバーレイを立ち上げネットサーフィンをする日々に溺れていた。

Die Sparvariante von Left 4 Dead

Wer von Zombies und Koop-Modus nicht genug bekommen kann, findet nun über Steam mit Killing Floor eine preiswerte Alternative zu Valves Left 4 Dead.

Was Killing Floor allerdings von Valves Vor-Zombies-Weglauferei unterscheidet: Es sind nicht nur vier, sondern maximal sechs Spieler, die sich gegen anrückende Untote wehren müssen, es kommen deutlich mehr unterschiedliche Waffen (ohne Fadenkreuz) zum Einsatz, und Sie können Ihre Fähigkeiten nach und nach verbessern. Allerdings fehlt Killing Floor der besonders spaßige Versus-Modus eines Left 4 Dead, und zum Schluss eines Abschnitts müssen die Spieler nicht auf Rettung harren, sondern schlicht ein Bossmonster umlegen.

Man schmeißt Ihnen normale Mutierte (die sich teils unsichtbar nähern) in den Weg und eine Reihe Spezial-Monster, die zwar äußerlich denen aus Left 4 Dead ähnlich sind, allerdings längst nicht deren Gefährlichkeitsgrad erreichen. Heulende Hexenwesen pusten Sie mit einem Schuss um, ebenso springende, an Hunter erinnernde Zombies.

Lediglich Gift spuckende Fettklöpse und zwei größere Gegnervarianten (eine mit Kettensäge) halten mehr aus. Und natürlich der Bosszombie, den Sie zum Schluss umlegen müssen. Der ballert auch als Einziger mit MG und Raketenwerfer auf Sie und kann sich ebenfalls temporär unsichtbar machen. Allerdings ist der Bursche kein Vergleich zu dem, was Ihnen in Valves Koop-Shooter am Ende entgegen geworfen wird.

Dass Killing Floor ursprünglich eine Modifikation zu Unreal Tournament 2004 war, erkennt man schon am seltsamen Gleiten der Spielerfiguren. Überhaupt kommt der Titel gerade in Sachen Animationen nicht an Left 4 Dead heran. Und auch die Spielmechaniken sind in Valves Infiziertenspiel deutlich ausgefeilter und variantenreicher, allerdings kostet Killing Floor mit 18 Euro auch nur einen Bruchteil von dem, was Sie für Left 4 Dead hinblättern müssen. Trotzdem bleibt Tripwires Zombiehatz nur etwas für fanatische Fans von Untoten plus Koop.
No other game has had me coming back this consistently over this much time.

Um jogo muito divertido apesar de ser muito antigo de "14 de Mai de 2009"
Muita gente ainda curti esse clássico!
O jogo é com 6 sobreviventes com 11 Waves pra você se divertir enfrentando zumbis alterados geneticamente
Com um super Boss no Final Chamado Patriarca.
È bem legal você sempre jogar com amigos para que possam jogar em equipe que é mais recomendável para que consigam chegar ao final das waves!
O gráficos do jogo também é muito bom e bem leve e roda em praticamente qualquer pc sem placa de vídeo.
Sua jogabilidade também é ótima, o jogo não possui muitos bugs e até hoje nunca vi nenhum hacker.
Pra min esse jogo é ótimo e sempre jogarei ele com meus amigos e também estou na espera do Killing Floor 2 pra ver 
qual será suas melhorias e evoluções do jogo ansiosamente!

I remember picking up this game in about 2013. I played coop with a friend on our own private server and it was okay. We both played Commando and played each of the maps a few times. We struggled to beat it on normal long. What I didn't realize then was the depth that this game actually presents. By playing as only commando we had completely neglected the other classes. We had thought the berserker to be useless and we didn't even know about the healing dart that the medic guns had. It wasn't until late 2014 that I picked it up again and played in the public server with my friend. I learned that I loved medic and he loved support. We loved the challenge of it. Before where it was just a simple zed shoot'em'up now it was a challenging team based game. 

This game is what you put into it. You have to take time to learn some of the finer mechanics. Even though this game is old and is beginning to show its age (especially with the second one out now), it is still a great game with a ton of content and amazing maps. The challenge is real to beat it on the higher difficulties. I came close to beating it on Hell on Earth once, but alas it did not happen. Whereas before I struggled to beat it on Normal long with my friend, now I can solo hard. It is rewarding to get father than you did in the previous match and you can feel you aptitude increase in the game. 

Get this game. If it on sale get this game for yourself and a friend. If you are on the ropes about the sequel, then get this game until the sequel comes out properly.

An all time classic and a must have !

[h1]Killing Floor é...[/h1]
[list]
[*]Um jogo bonito considerando sua idade.
[*]Bem fácil de jogar.
[*]Tem ZEDTIME (mate os monstros em câmera lenta).
[*]Contém 5 dificuldades:Beginner,Normal,Hard,Suicidal e Hell on Earth).
[*]Grande variedade de armas (algumas DLC's trazem armas extras) e de inimigos (ZEDS).
[*]Soundtrack de arrepiar,dá vontade de parar o jogo e começar a fazer uma guitarra aérea (sério).
[*]Um Boss com um lança míssil na mão junto com uma metralhadora (WAT?).
[*]Tem 7 perks(vantagens):Sharpshooter,Medic,Support,Commando,Firebug,Demolition e Berserker.
[*]Multiplayer ativo com bastante players.
[*]Pode jogar com os amigo tudo ( 6 players por sala).
[*]Tem suporte com a Oficina Steam.
[*]Em promoção o jogo fica por uns 6 à 7 reais.
[*]Vários personagens (é sério,tem muitos personagens).
[*]Muitos mapas.
[/list]
Se realmente vale a pena?SIM,vale a pena!

The game has kind of limited content yet it never ends. You just keep playing it and never uninstall.

For the begginers it's fun to kill mutants, for the veterans it's fun to challenge themselves on very tough difficulties.

The game offers multiple ways of killing multiple types of mutants with multiple weapons while playing as one of multiple classes. It's a very intuitive game that requires strategy, teamwork and leveled up perks later on. It's joy to play with friends as it is to play with random players for there's communication dialog which provides tons of really funny dialogues. There are often events going on making the mutants look differently and say hilarious things.

I totally recommend this game to anyone who likes coop horror survivals, it really is better than silly productions like L4D2.

Good Survival-horror game for people who love wave after wave games.

Really enjoyed this game since I bought it over 2 years ago. It was wont to crash from time to time but not excessively, or beyond my own tholing. The graphics are from the mid 2000s. Nevertheless, the murderoushood of the game hove a height of murder that was bloody fabulous! You get to kill zombie-esque "specimens" over and over with shotguns, bipping pistols, flamey flames, slinging grenades, and my favorite, brrrrt brrrt Bertie Wooster assault rifles! You're off to London, lad, to cleanse the streets of demented filth! No time for dilly dallying amid the Drones, old boy. Yessir! Thump a specimen on the ol' 'ead with a katana and bung a grenade up 'is arse for good measure. THEN it's off to the Drones Club, old boy.
The 6 man--6 PERSON (the DLC has wifely characters) squads fight together or not at all. It makes for sore tedious playing when *alone* since you quickly find your back against a wall, often concrete or steel, which straight away is all decked out with your mushy remnants. Therefore, the back watching must be done.
The boss is unique because he's always the same sick son of a bitch in need of a lozenge. And physically he's as unique as if Howard Stern had had a baby with Rush Limbaugh and the abomination arose from their mutual hate to become Caitlyn Jenner. Just kidding! The Patriarch is a sadistic science bitch's reanimated specimen with a rocket launcher for an arm and a grapple sucker for a sternum. You can tell thereby a strongly implied Dr. Who influence. The obvious anatomical reference is to the plunger bearing Daleks, of course. It's a fact which I wouldn't waste a moment checking.
Just one slight problem. I haven't leveled up since March 2013 even though I played it into July 2014 half-regularly. Last week in July 2015, I downloaded it on a new computer and played a half dozen games. Of course I earned no experience. It highlights the greater futility and meaninglessness of experience earning in games. Such a pathetic waste of human life in the end. Hence, I only played the game for the experience of playing, not the experience of gaming. Ya KNOW! Yeah...never play a game only for in game experience.
RECOMMENDED to ream out your life's sorrows through vicarious knightly murder of dystopian nightmare demons. Play with others and be nice...stick a syringe in 'em. They will thank you for sharing needles. Sharing is caring.
So ends the story of the gameplay of the thing.
